Up to now the game has been rather average in terms of entertainment, with little in the way of thrilling moments. The hosts dominated much of the first period. The home team are playing possession football, while the away team look to find a weakness in the opposition's defence mainly with their rapid counter attacks.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for half time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 1 min. of added time.
Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) starts his run too early and the referee blows for offside.

Nemanja Radoja (Celta Vigo) collects a rebound a long way out and doesn't hesitate to release a goal bound hammer of a shot. His attempt is precise and low towards the middle of the target. It would have ended in the back of the net if it wasn't for Francisco Casilla and his nice save.
Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo) whips in the resulting set piece but it's cleared.
Ricardo de Burgos Bengoetxea blows his whistle after Casemiro (Real Madrid) kicks an opponent's legs instead of the ball. Free kick. Celta Vigo will probably just try to cross the ball in from here.

Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) gets into a good scoring position. He creates some space for himself and tries his luck from distance. His decent effort towards the right post is, however, superbly saved by Sergio Alvarez!
Fabian Orellana (Celta Vigo) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort.
Real Madrid seem to be finding their feet as they enjoy some possession. They are waiting for the right moment to create new attacking opportunities.
Gareth Bale (Real Madrid) connects with the corner kick around the penalty spot, but steers his header just wide of the left post.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: There's an opportunity for Toni Kroos (Real Madrid) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.

Luka Modric (Real Madrid) receives a low pass just outside the box and unleashes a fine strike towards the left post. Sergio Alvarez pulls off a reflexive save to block his effort. Nice goalkeeping skill, indeed.
Marco Asensio (Real Madrid) tries to find Gareth Bale, but he puts too much power on the pass.

Daniel Wass (Celta Vigo) gets to the rebound just outside the box, but his attempt is blocked by one of the defending players.
Great teamplay by Real Madrid as they control the ball with a lot of short passes. Patience is the key if they want to find a gap in the defence to score.
Luka Modric (Real Madrid) is unlucky with a goal bound effort from the edge of the box. A fortuitous save from Sergio Alvarez stops the ball from going into the middle of the goal.
Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) strikes from the edge of the box, but hits it really poorly and sends the ball way wide of the left post.
Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid) is penalised after knocking an opponent down.
Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him.

Celta Vigo are ruled offside.
Alvaro Morata (Real Madrid) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away.
